We’re pleased to announce the 50 Black Women Impact Leaders who are transforming communities!

We are proud to invest $10MM with Black Women Impact Leaders as they meaningfully plan, build and implement their work. Learn more: https://t.co/qs705fCkvc #BlackWomenImpact https://t.co/1qsTZ01sKc
Retail investors have turned into sellers in recent months—with one exception, explains Goldman Sachs’ John Marshall. Listen here: https://t.co/WVFN2zEMsx #ExchangesGS https://t.co/CILwOTFUQ9

Introducing Great Investors, a new weekly podcast series featuring some of the world’s most respected investors on their insights and strategies.  

Listen to the podcasts here, presented by Exchanges at Goldman Sachs🎙️: https://t.co/F7EuPgSnmD #ExchangesGS https://t.co/bY5fdO3aci
